name: Freethinker - Shade of the Wyrm Tamers (WIP)
name_original: Freethinker - Shade of the Wyrm Tamers (WIP)
description:
This is a work-in-progress!!! (especially since Blasphemer is still unfinished)

(re)Discover that olden-school fantasy FPS from the early 90's, for free, legally!

One ready-to-play package:
  • Freethinker - Shade of the Wyrm Tamers
    • compatible with the 1994 FPS, and its 1996 expansion
    • includes: Unbeliever, HUMP mini, Valley of Saints, The Crypts
Software:
  • Engine: Chocolate Heretic
  • Data: Blasphemer (work-in-progress)
  • Random map generator: SLIGE + dm2conv + BSP
  • Classic adventures from https://www.doomworld.com/idgames/

Open-source win32-compatible software, 25MB unzipped.

Also available: ROSS (2 variants: Ultimate Revelation and Inferno Earth)
